verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--vipra kāṅhe kara upavāsa
kene eta duḥkha, kene karaha hutāśa

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; vipra—My dear brāhmaṇa; kāṅhe—why; kara upavāsa—you are fasting; kene—why; eta—so much; duḥkha—unhappiness; kene—why; karaha hutāśa—you express so much worry.
translation: While the brāhmaṇa was fasting, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu asked him, "Why are you fasting? Why are you so unhappy? Why are you so worried?"
